alert.note: Alert for Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:24PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Winona, east central Wabasha, central Buffalo and west central Trempealeau Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1023 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alma, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo City around 1030 PM CDT. Buffalo around 1035 PM CDT. Fountain City around 1055 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pioneer Campground, Waumandee, Weaver, Merrick State Park, Czechville, Highway 95 And County G, West Newton, Cream, Highway 88 And County O and Whitman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Wisconsin. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
